revised_title: Fossil Floras of Wyre Forest and Coalfield Geology
tldr: This study examines fossil floras in the Wyre Forest Coalfield, dividing the area into four regions and analyzing plant life from three of them. The research reveals that the Sweet Coal Series belongs to the Middle Coal Measures, while the Sulphur Coal Series is part of the Transition Coal Measures. The findings contribute to understanding the geology and plant life of the Wyre Forest and its relationship to neighboring coal measure areas.
